languages.text: "Мне казалось, ты должна уже была извлечь урок о том, какова цена излишнего внимания к твоим "шепоткам". Остерегайся тех, кого привыкла считать своими друзьями, Идира".

"I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."
languages.original_text: "Мне казалось, ты должна уже была извлечь урок о том, какова цена излишнего внимания к твоим "шепоткам". Остерегайся тех, кого привыкла считать своими друзьями, Идира".

traits.locale_text: "I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我本以为，你已经学会了如何适当无视你那些‘小小的低语者’。或许你已经习惯了它们的存在，但它们并不是你的朋友，伊迪拉。要谨慎对待它们。”
languages.original_text: "I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: “我本以为，你已经学会了如何适当无视你那些‘小小的低语者’。或许你已经习惯了它们的存在，但它们并不是你的朋友，伊迪拉。要谨慎对待它们。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vous n'avez donc toujours pas compris qu'il ne fallait pas écouter vos "petites voix" ? Vous vous êtes peut-être habituée à leur présence, Idira, mais n'allez pas croire qu'elles sont vos amies. Méfiez-vous. »
languages.original_text: "I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez donc toujours pas compris qu'il ne fallait pas écouter vos "petites voix" ? Vous vous êtes peut-être habituée à leur présence, Idira, mais n'allez pas croire qu'elles sont vos amies. Méfiez-vous. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Creía que a estas alturas habría aprendido a no fiarse demasiado de sus "pequeños susurros", Idira. Aunque se haya acostumbrado a su presencia, no son sus amigos. Tenga cuidado con ellos».
languages.original_text: "I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: «Creía que a estas alturas habría aprendido a no fiarse demasiado de sus "pequeños susurros", Idira. Aunque se haya acostumbrado a su presencia, no son sus amigos. Tenga cuidado con ellos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「いいかげん”小さな囁き”に構うのをやめたらどうだ。イディラ、奴らの存在に慣れちまったとしても、友人とは違う。慎重に扱うことだ」
languages.original_text: "I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: 「いいかげん”小さな囁き”に構うのをやめたらどうだ。イディラ、奴らの存在に慣れちまったとしても、友人とは違う。慎重に扱うことだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Habt Ihr denn noch immer nicht gelernt, Euren 'kleinen Flüsterern' keine allzu große Aufmerksamkeit zu schenken? Ihr seid ihre Anwesenheit vielleicht gewohnt, Idira, doch sie sind nicht Eure Freunde. Seid auf der Hut."
languages.original_text: "I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr denn noch immer nicht gelernt, Euren 'kleinen Flüsterern' keine allzu große Aufmerksamkeit zu schenken? Ihr seid ihre Anwesenheit vielleicht gewohnt, Idira, doch sie sind nicht Eure Freunde. Seid auf der Hut."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."

languages.text: "'Minik fısıldayanlar'ını bu kadar ciddiye almaman gerektiğini öğrenmişsindir sanıyordum. Varlıklarına alışmış olman, arkadaşın oldukları anlamına gelmez İdira. Dikkatli ol."
languages.original_text: "I thought you would have learned by now not to pay too much attention to your 'little whisperers.' You may have become inured to their presence, Idira, but they are not your friends. Tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: "'Minik fısıldayanlar'ını bu kadar ciddiye almaman gerektiğini öğrenmişsindir sanıyordum. Varlıklarına alışmış olman, arkadaşın oldukları anlamına gelmez İdira. Dikkatli ol."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
